content.text:
# List of King's and Queen's commissioners of Friesland

This article is a list of King's and Queen's commissioners of the province of Friesland, Netherlands.
List of King's and Queen's commissioners of Friesland since 1945
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center"
! colspan=3 | King's and Queen's  commissioners of Friesland
! Term of office
! Party
|-
! style="background:;"|
| rowspan=3 |
| rowspan=3 | Harry  Linthorst Homan  (1905–1989)
| rowspan=3 | 1 December 1945 –  12 June 1970  ()
| Liberal State Party  (1945–1946)
|-
! rowspan=2 style="background:;"|
| Freedom Party  (1946–1948)
|-
| People's Party  for Freedom and  Democracy  (1948–1970)
|-
! style="background:;"|
| rowspan=2 |
| rowspan=2 | Hedzer Rijpstra  (1919–2011)
| rowspan=2 | 12 June 1970 –  16 June 1982  ()
| Christian  Historical Union  (1970–1980)
|-

| Christian  Democratic Appeal  (1980–1982)
|-
! style="background:;"|
